item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I'm sorry for my inability to let unimportant things go, for my inability to hold on to the important things." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I think and think and think, Iâ€˜ve thought myself out of happiness one million times, but never once into it." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "When I looked at you, my life made sense. Even the bad things made sense. They were necessary to make you possible." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "She had fallen in love so many times that she began to suspect she was not falling in love at all, but doing something much more ordinary." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description:
"Brod's life was a slow realization that the world was not for her, and that for whatever reason, she would never be happy and honest at the same time. She felt as if she were brimming, always producing and hoarding more love inside her. But there was no release...
So she had to satisfy herself with the idea of love--loving the loving of things whose existence she didn't care at all about. Love itself became the object of her love. She loved herself in love, she loved loving love, as love loves loving, and was able, in that way, to reconcile herself with a world that fell so short of what she would have hoped for. It was not the world that was the great and saving lie, but her willingness to make it beautiful and fair, to live a once-removed life, in a world once-removed from the one in which everyone else seemed to exist." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "It has shown me that everything is illuminated in the light of the past. It is always along the side of us...on the inside, looking out." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Love me, because love doesn't exist, and I have tried everything that does." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "To you, I'm an atheist. To God, I'm the loyal opposition." -- Woody Allen

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I'd take the awe of understanding over the awe of ignorance any day." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "All thinking men are atheists." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Edmond de Goncourt
item.description: "If there is a God, atheism must seem to Him as less of an insult than religion." -- Edmond de Goncourt

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "No matter how careful you are, there's going to be the sense you missed something, the collapsed feeling under your skin that you didn't experience it all. There's that fallen heart feeling that you rushed right through the moments where you should've been paying attention. Well, get used to that feeling. That's how your whole life will feel some day. This is all practice." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You are not your job, you're not how much money you have in the bank. You are not the car you drive. You're not the contents of your wallet. You are not your fucking khakis. You are all singing, all dancing crap of the world." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When we don't know who to hate, we hate ourselves." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Our real discoveries come from chaos, from going to the place that looks wrong and stupid and foolish." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You are not special. You're not a beautiful and unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else. We're all part of the same compost heap. We're all singing, all dancing crap of the world." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Reality means you live until you die...the real truth is nobody wants reality." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: fighthate add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We've all been raised on television to believe that one day we'd all be millionaires, and movie gods, and rock stars. But we won't. And we're slowly learning that fact. And we're very, very pissed off." -- Chuck Palahniuk
